name: Yezza
description: Yezza started in 2020, when Covid19 began & all kind of businesses were highly at stake. We aspire to ease the entrepreneurs to start online business. We have already grown into a team of 18 staffs in 2021, and currently continue growing. More than 50,000 online businesses have been using Yezza, and this number grows from day to day. Within only a year, Yezza has introduced two new products, which are Yezza Books (accounting software) & Yezza Canvas (custom business system). Our mission is simply to make running business easier.
Headline: We build OS for businesses
ShortDescription: We build technologies to help entrepreneurs earn money & save time.

Highlights.name: Fast support
Highlights.description: Reply in minutes & fast resolution time.

enhanced_description: Yezza, launched in 2020, functions as an operating system designed to simplify business operations for entrepreneurs, particularly aiding in the establishment and management of online businesses. The platform has rapidly expanded, now serving over 50,000 online businesses, and has introduced complementary products like Yezza Books (accounting software) and Yezza Canvas (a custom business system). Yezza aims to help entrepreneurs increase earnings and save time by offering key features such as a customer database, online store and page creation, and marketing and customer engagement tools. The product emphasizes ease of use, automation to enhance workflow efficiency, and robust customer support with fast resolution times. Beyond core business operations, Yezza also seeks to improve employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Setting up and managing online stores and business pages
Business accounting and financial management (via Yezza Books)
Custom business system development (via Yezza Canvas)
Initiatives to improve employee happiness and engagement
competitive_advantages: Proven market adoption with over 50,000 online businesses utilizing the platform
roi_benefits: Support for starting and managing online businesses
scalability_features: Supports businesses from small to global enterprise sizes
Designed to accommodate a growing user base, currently serving over 50,000 online businesses
